detail_desc: Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leather gloves with uppers in soft, felted fabric containing some wool. Fine-knit lining.
Dress in patterned organic cotton slub jersey with press-studs at the top of each side, short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and flannel bottoms. Top with a round neck and chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Metal rings in various designs.

Short dress in lace with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a skirt with a gathered seam for added volume and width. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short skirt in jersey with shimmering details with an elasticated waist.
Joggers in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped front pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with text-print side stripes and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, a chest pocket with an embroidered motif, concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbing at the hems.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, reflective details and ribbed hems.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wide lace trim at the top and hem. Unlined.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dungaree dress in washed denim with adjustable straps, buttons right down the front and front pockets.
Short shorts in an airy viscose weave with patch front pockets, a high, elasticated waist with a small frill trim and sewn-on ties, and wide legs.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Elasticated satin scrunchie.
Joggers in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and wide ribbing at the hems.
Imitation suede ballet pumps with one open side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Derby shoes with decorative welt seams and open lacing at the front. Rubber soles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in cotton-blend slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Regular fit.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Zipped side pockets, back pockets, and tapered legs that are gathered at the hems.
Yoga jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a decorative hole pattern at the top and a racer back. Seam at the waist with an opening and sewn-in lacing at the hems.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative buttons at the top. Short sleeves with a tie detail, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Calf-length dress in airy satin with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, a drawstring at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar with ties and a V-neck. Raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill at the cuffs.

Set with a top, pair of shorts and pair of tights. Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with frill trim over the shoulders and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with elastication at the back of the waistband, a fake fly with a press-stud, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a fake fly, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a sequined motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Flat hoop earrings in metal and snakeskin-patterned imitation leather. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Wide, checked blouse in soft viscose flannel with a V-neck and long, wide raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Oversized, one-button coat in a soft, felted wool blend with narrow notch lapels, flap front pockets and high slits in the sides. Unlined. The wool and polyester content of the coat are recycled.
Coat in soft, supple leather with wide notch lapels and a concealed fastening at the front. Welt side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Saddle bag in imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a metal fastener. One inner compartment and a detachable narrow metal chain shoulder strap with an imitation leather section on the shoulder. Lined. Size 7x14.5x17.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit jacket in a soft viscose blend with a drawstring hood, zip and front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Backpack in woven fabric with a text print and reversible sequin motif. Handle and zip at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. Size 10x25x34 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.

Straight-cut, calf-length shirt dress in soft, washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets with a concealed button, side pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots with a zip at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.
Soft jersey hats.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a smocked bodice and wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Gathered seam on the skirt for added width. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Sleeveless dress in patterned jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow, braided shoulder straps that cross at the back. Double layer at the top with a braided trim. Longer at the back.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and high cut at the back.
Hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trainers in imitation suede with a small platform, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, back 3.5 cm.
A-line dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Set in soft organic cotton jersey. Two romper suits with off-centre press-studs down the front and along one leg, and full feet with elasticated heels. Two long-sleeved bodysuits with a wrapover front, and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. One pair of trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a hat, and a pair of scratch mittens with no thumbs. The set is supplied in a drawstring bag.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. The skirt is in a softly draping, asymmetric cut with a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
Nursing bra in soft microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style with short slits in the sides.
Extra-long waist belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. The belt can be worn with a simple knot to take your outfit to the next level. Width 2.8 cm.
Triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable lacing at the front and lacing at the back and back of the neck.

Sandals in patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate with a small loop at the back and straps with hook and loop fasteners. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester. Moulded insoles with a textured pattern to give the feet a better grip, and patterned soles.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend in a relaxed, straight fit with long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a slightly wider neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in woven fabric with a gathered yoke at the front, buttons at the back of the neck and a small flounced trim over the shoulders. Lined at the top.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and decorative flounces front and back that start at the neck and extend down the sleeves. Straight-cut top section with a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide seam at the hem.
